name: Prismatica (itch)
description:
Mac and Linux versions are up(?)

...but I cannot test them. I needed to disable burst for them to build, so any feedback on performance or functionality would be appreciated.

__________________________________________________________________________

Instead of refracting color with lenses, why not refract magic?

For mini jam 62 I present to you Prismatica! It's definitely a little rough, but overall I think it turned out ok. 

The post-jam update fixes a crash and an issue that caused world text not to display.(the game was originally designed with Web in mind so the quit button is alt+f4 ... sorry)

As per the limitation, all "animation" is either procedural, or driven through code.

All work on Prismatica was done solo using Unity 2020.4f, Blender, and Reaper

Wanna hear the soundtrack? I didn't think so. But here it is anyways
